body.name: Lonkwa L-Shaped Couch Couches for Living Room, Convertible Sectional Sofa with Storage Ottoman, 3-Seat Grey Sectional Sofas for Living Room/Bedroom/Office/Small Space
features: ☑️【L-Shape Sectional Sofa】This living room couches with a movable ottoman, ottoman can be attached to any seat according to your preference. You can decide the position and shape you want on this Sectional Sleeper Sofa. Snuggle up with your favorite pet on the L-shaped sofa of our lonkwa.

☑️【Comfortable & Durable Sofa】The sofas & couches is made of quality linen fabric with a solid wood + iron frame as the basic structure, which is breathable and stable. And the seat cushion filled with high density foam and inner spring provides comfort and durability. The sofa set is perfect for anyone who wants to rest after a busy day.

☑️【Bonus Storage Space】On a reversible sectional sofa, lifting the cushion on the ottoman opens up a storage space. Whether it's a TV remote control, magazines and books, or mobile phones and tablets, they can be placed in the storage space, which is practical and convenient. The side pockets on the armrest allow you to easily reach and grab whatever you need.

☑️【All-in-One Package】Crafted for convenient shipment and easy assembly. All parts are marked with either a letter or a number, and the instructions show exactly which parts should be used. You just need to follow the steps install the sectional sofa. You can assemble the sofa easily within 30 minutes. Sofa in a box.

☑️【Wide Application】Small sectional sofa fits perfectly with any indoor decor, such as living room, apartment, office, college dorm and small place. Please confirm whether the product size meets your needs before purchasing.
body.description: All your best angles. Whether you're a corner seat napper, a ottoman lounger, or an always squeezes into the middle aficionado, you'll have the best seat in the house.Small sectional sofa, Sectional couches for living room, L-Shaped Couch 3-Seat Wide Reversible Couch with Modern Linen Fabric, Perk up a living room or entertainment space with a comfortable and tasteful sofa.Reason for Choosing LonkwaMovable Ottoman for Free ConfigurationRemovable Cushions and Cushion CoversSponge for Upgraded ComfortSturdy Structure with LegsHandy Side Pocket◆Specifications:Material: Linen Fabric, Metal, Wood, CottonColor: Dark Gray, Light Grey, BeigeSofa Dimensions: 78"D x 29"W x 33"HItem Weight: 109 lbsWeight Capacity: 660 lbs. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All your sectional couch best angles. Whether you're a corner seat napper, a ottoman lounger, or an always squeezes into the middle aficionado, you'll have the best seat in the house.

Removal Storage Ottoman The ottoman can be placed left or right to form sofa bed, can also be used as a storage box alone. Convenient for you to store remote controls, magazines or other small items. Comfortable Fabric Our l shaped couch made of high-quality linen fabric. It has a high sense of comfort and a smooth and shiny texture. not only comfortable and durable, but also not stuffy when sitting for a long time. Serpentine Springs The sectional sofa is made of high-density serpentine springs, which can provide balanced support strength and are not easily deformed or relaxed. It has higher stability and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Cheap Couch
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I think this is a really good couch. The bottom cushions are really comfortable, the back cushions are a little thin, but pretty cozy and you can easily add a pillow. The only 'unsturdy' thing we've noticed is the back support (the metal frame behind the back cushions) has a bit of play in it. So it will give a little and crack and creak if you sit down a little too hard. So, here's hoping that it doesn't become an issue later on.Putting the couch together was pretty simple, they even gave some extra screws which was thoughtful. There's a little space underneath to store stuff or be a play-place for cats, haha. I like that the arm rests are flat -- I can easily set my phone on them and it won't slide off.The ottoman has storage inside and it can velcro (underneath) to the couch so it won't slide away. The lid of the ottoman does not have a hinge.The back cushions also velco on, the bottom cushions do not.Also note: Our couch was delivered in one box. The cushions were vacuum sealed and we almost thought we were missing one because it only came it two bags, but one back had 2 of the cushion in it! So make sure you double check before thinking something is missing.Overall, it was a great experience buying our first couch online. It's not the best couch in the world, but we can't afford something super expensive right now and this is going to work absolutely great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my small apartment
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together! Mind boggling how it all fit in one box. There are parts inside the armrests so check there if your missing anything. I was not missing any pieces or parts to my couch. The back is definitely lower than I thought it would be. But all in all, for the price it's very decent. I did unzip all the cushions and remove the cushion covers so I could iron out the wrinkles. That helped the back cushions puff up and the seat memory foam cushions return to their original shape much faster. Very comfortable to sit on and sleep on but I wish the back was taller. Probably will upgrade to something better in the future but for now it will work for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I gave it a chance but most of reviews were true, not even good for decoration. Not that hard to assemble but some parts do not fit and is extremely thin and uncomfortable. Do not buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, we had a bit of trouble finding some parts because they were hidden inside the armrests. We thought that there was a box missing so we had to contact customer service. Since they don't talk to customers directly we had to have Amazon customer serve as the intermediaries. However that was an oversight on our part and we found the parts as soon as we read the manual more thoroughly.As a whole the couch looks pretty good, it has the potential of being better. But it's lower than I expected it to be. The ottoman is not properly proportioned as seen in the picture. We had already tightened the frame since the manual instructs to assemble the ottoman frame first. This resulted in the the bottom not being able to fit. We had to loosen the frame in order for the top and bottom square to fit. The cushions are a lot thinner than pictured which makes it less comfortable than it could be and makes some gaps (also pictured). I had seen a couch at living spaces which was about the same price but I went with this one just because it had an included ottoman. I should have just gotten the one at living spaces, it was definitely higher quality than this couch set :|

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little couch for the price !
reviews.reviewText: Great couch - it is exactly what I was trying to pay for - the price is excellent. It’s not Broyhill, but it is rugged, compfy, and fits the space and the need perfectly. I have limited access to my basement and the shipping box it arrived in was perfect. It took me about 1 1/2 hours to assemble, but everything went together perfectly. No issues. Nice couch - buy it for your unusual needs - you will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was supposed to go into our living room. It will now go into our basement. Product was apparently defective when it arrived, but we didn’t know until we got it 3/4 of the way put together. By that time it was too much hassle to put back into the box. Cushions are ok. Will add a few pillows to the couch when moved to the basement. Decent size. Some of the legs for the couch were already stripped and would not screw in. My husband had to use a flat head to pry other parts open to slide the back of the couch into place. Ottoman was great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: When the couch arrived, it was damaged. I contacted customer service and they addressed the problem immediately. Not bad couch for the price. The back could use more cushion but everything else is okay considering the price. To help make it more comfy, I purchased additional pillows to provide more back support.The couch is perfect for my playroom, small and cozy. If you need something small and inexpensive, then this is your couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for my small apartment ! you definitely get what you pay for, it’s pretty comfy but the back cushions are a bit thin. the sofa also sits a bit low but overall i like it! super easy to put together too.
